text: Pedro Nájera Pacheco (3 February 1929 – 21 August 2020) was a Mexican football midfielder. He played for Mexico national team in two FIFA World Cup tournaments (1954 and 1962). He also played for Club América. Nájera died on 21 August 2020 at the age of 91. ==References== Category:Mexican footballers Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths
title: Pedro Nájera
